reviewText: I'VE BEEN A FAN OF WILLY DEVILLE FOR 30 YEARS AND I FEEL SAD THAT HE HAS TOTALLY INCOMPANTANT CAMERA PEOPLE WORKING FOR HIM.ABOUT HALF WAY THRU THE SHOW A CAMERA MAN GOES SPASTIC. IN FOCUS, OUT OF FOCUS SHAKEY IMAGES ETC. FROM THE SONG SAVIOR FARE ON, THE SHOW SLIPPED INTO DISARRAY. OTHER THAN HEARING A FEW OLDER MINK DEVILLE SONGS, DON'T BOTHER WITH THIS DVD. BUY THE "BERLIN" DVD.IT GIVES YOU A BETTER DEFINATION OF WHO WILLY REALLY IS MUSICALLY AND IS FILMED A WHOLE LOT BETTER. AT ONE POINT WILLY ASKED IF ANYBODY HAD ANY MORPHINE. JUDGEING FROM THE CAMERA WORK ON THIS DVD, THE CAMERA MAN HAD IT ALL!!!!!!!!!!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Very eclectic show. If Johnny Winter was the lead singer for Los Lobos it would sound a lot like this show. DeVille sounds exactly like Winter in the blues songs. In other songs he sounds at times like Bob Dylan,Kris Kristofferson,Lou Reed or Ian Hunter. The band makes everything interesting even as the singer sits throughout and reads most of his lyrics. In addition to some fine guitar and keyboard work the band also supplies harmonica, accordion and violin in places with some excellent backup vocals. Most songs come from the south and southwest and gravelly vocals work better in some songs than others. Ending the show with the great slow Everly Bros. song (Let It Be Me)done Joe Cocker style made for a quiet close to the show. Seeing the show with the option to turn on or off interviews between the songs is a great idea which should be a feature of every concert dvd.

reviewText: This is one of the best concert DVDs I own. Very good audio and the camera work is just fine. Willy's performance is totally satisfying for us long time fans.

reviewText: Willy Deville R.I.P 1950 - 2009.Blues music at a very high level. The man is a class act, we'll - respected by his peers in the music business. His die - hard fans in the U.S.A. always supported him whenever he toured. The last concert of Deville that I saw was at Tramps in NVC 1999. A great show as always. This Blu-ray disc has a great set list from this great artist. Buy it, you won't be disappointed.
summary: Truly an original artist..In the truest sense of the word...
